COF-C02.name: SnowPro Core Certification
COF-C02.description: Validates knowledge of Snowflake's core platform features and architecture

DEA-C01.name: SnowPro Data Engineer Certification
DEA-C01.description: Validates expertise in building and maintaining data pipelines in Snowflake

ARA-C01.name: SnowPro Architect Certification
ARA-C01.description: Validates expertise in designing enterprise-grade Snowflake solutions

GES-C01.name: SnowPro Gen AI Specialty Certification
GES-C01.description: Validates expertise in building Generative AI applications using Snowflake Cortex
